Call for Posters for AHILA, Lusaka, Zambia

Important dates for full papers:

Time zone: Anywhere On Earth (AOE)
Poster abstracts due: April 26, 2024 May 17, 2024 June 7, 2024
Poster abstract notifications: May 17, 2024 June 7, 2024 June 29, 2024
Posters due: July 19, 2024 August 16, 2024 September 27, 2024
Poster notifications: August 16, 2024 September 6, 2024

The 27th Association for Health Information and Libraries in Africa (AHILA 2025), to be held in Lusaka, Zambia, welcomes contributions related to any aspect of its aims, missions and vision.

Poster Submissions

/Posters/ poster data if needed.

Submission Guidelines

Abstracts for full papers and posters must be submitted on the AHILA 2025.

ABSTRACT SUBMISSION GUIDLINES

Abstract submission format.

All papers must be submitted via
Microsoft's Conference Management Toolkit platform: https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/ETD2024

publication website
